team.name: Amirlan Amanzholov
team.role: Chief organizer of Maths Battles Community
team.description: responsible for tournament organization and problem selection. Scholarship Awardee at Haileybury Almaty, winner of the Republican Olympiad in mathematics, International Math Olympiad 2024 , 2025 silver medalist, member of the national team.

team.name: Timur Murat
team.role: Organizer and head of the academic committee of Maths Battles Community
team.description: responsible for web-development and problem selection. Scholarship Awardee at Haileybury Almaty, Asian Pacific Math Olympiad gold medalist and Balkan Math Olympiad 2024 bronze medalist, member of the national team.

team.name: Gleb Patyrin
team.role: Co-founder and organizer of Maths Battles Community
team.description: Winner of various Math Olympiads, scholarship awardee at Haileybury Almaty and Richmond University.

team.name: Miron Yurkevich
team.description: Scholarship Awardee at Haileybury Almaty and Cambridge University, winner of prestigious math olympiads, including International Math Olympiad 2022, 2023, 2024 and 2025 silver medals.

team.name: Alikhan Serikuly
team.description: Gold medalist of the Republican Mathematics Olympiad, participant of the Mathematics and Chemistry Olympiads, Scholarship Awardee at Haileybury Almaty and Brown University.

team.name: Issatay Jaxykeldinov
team.description: Scholarship Awardee at CUHK. Alumni of the National School of Physics and Math.

team.name: Nazar Berkimbay
team.description: Student at Ecole Polytechnique with 100% stipend, silver medal at IEO, IZhO
